dfischer.utils

Class IaikPkcs11SecurityProvider

  • java.lang.Object
    • iaik.security.ssl.SecurityProvider
      • iaik.security.ssl.IaikProvider
        • dfischer.utils.IaikPkcs11SecurityProvider

  • public class IaikPkcs11SecurityProvider
extends iaik.security.ssl.IaikProvider
    Support for PKCS#11 security devices. Implements the SecurityProvider interface of IAIK-SSL. It overrides the default behavior of the IaikProvider in a way that enables the use of PKCS#11 keys and the PKCS#11 provider.
    See Also:
    PKCS11Config
